title: Bajaj launches Platina 110 ABS, the country's first 110cc bike with anti-lock braking
description: â€‹Priced at Rs 72,224 (ex-showroom Delhi), the Bajaj bike is powered by a 115.45cc engine that outputs a maximum power of 8.6hp at 7000rpm. The bike's maximum torque clocks in at 9.81 Nm at 5000rpm. It can hit top speeds of 90kmph.
